email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Can you do better, say in the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $48.50 per metric ton, but that's the best I can do given the current market. The vessel is in excellent condition, and demurrage is set at $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for October 15-20 and confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. I’ve attached the full vessel details for your review. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20, and demurrage remains at $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for signing. Thanks for your help! Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Contract Attached
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the contract for your review and signature. Let me know if you have any questions. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
